content: harvest a basic cozy cardigan ♥ by tin can knits harvest cardigan a basic cozy cardigan from tin can knits learn to knit with alexa and emily the harvest cardigan is part of the simple collection a learn to knit series with excellent free patterns and clear tutorials knit it in the free tin can knits app see only your size help linked on each instruction make notes and tick through sizing suggested needles 0-6 mo 6-12 mo 1-2 yrs 2-4 yrs 4-6 yrs 6-8 yrs us #6 / 4mm & us #8 / 5mm 8-10 yrs adult xs s sm m ml l xl xxl 3xl or as required to meet gauge 4xl 5xl 6xl sizes listed in this order unless 0-6 mo to xs 24 - 32 circular needles and otherwise noted dpns* in each size see sizing table for garment measurements s to 6xl 40 + circulars and dpns* in each size yarn *magic loop technique with a single long circular needle can be used in place of dpns worsted/aran weight yarn - see sizing table for notions yardages samples shown in madelinetosh vintage in darning needle stitch markers glazed pecan and silver fox gauge 18 sts & 24 row / 4 in stockinette on larger needles harvest cardigan facebook-square instagram ravelry pinterest envelope www tincanknits com 2 sizing notes the harvest cardigan looks great with a little bit of positive or a little bit of negative ease nina is wearing a size sm 37 with 2 of negative ease and hunter is wearing size 2-4 yrs 24 with 2 positive ease sizing table the sizing table lists finished garment measurements choose a size based upon your chest measurement plus desired ease lengths are given in inches and yards one inch = 2 54 cm one yard = 0 91 m size a b c d e yardage 0-6 mo 18 5 6 5 6 6 75 4 5 250 6-12 mo 20 5 7 5 7 7 4 5 350 harvest cardigan facebook-square instagram ravelry pinterest envelope www tincanknits com 3 sezis dlihc 1-2 yrs 22 8 5 8 7 5 5 25 450 2-4 yrs 24 10 5 9 8 5 25 500 4-6 yrs 25 5 12 11 9 6 5 600 6-8 yrs 28 5 13 14 9 25 6 5 700 8-10 yrs 30 5 15 16 10 25 7 850 sezis tluda d e b c a a - chest circumference b - sleeve length underarm to cuff c - body length underarm to hem d - top sleeve circumference e - yoke depth xs 31 5 18 18 11 7 1000 s 33 5 19 19 12 7 75 1100 sm 37 19 19 12 5 8 25 1200 m 38 20 20 13 8 25 1300 ml 40 20 20 14 25 9 1400 l 42 21 21 15 9 75 1500 xl 46 5 21 21 16 10 25 1600 xxl 49 5 21 21 17 25 11
